about.title: About me
about.end-content: . I am currently based in Paris, France, where I work as a CTO, Project Manager, and Web Developer. My professional journey has been fueled by a deep passion for technology and innovation. I thrive on exploring the latest technological advancements and discovering how they can be harnessed to improve our world. Whether it’s through leading projects, developing web applications, or managing teams, my goal is to make a positive impact and drive progress.

intro.1: Launching a startup while being a student is a thrilling yet daunting task, especially when taking on the role of Chief Technology Officer (CTO). This article delves into the unique constraints and advantages of being a student CTO in a startup launched with friends, highlighting the impact of inexperience and the balancing act required to juggle academic and entrepreneurial responsibilities.
intro.2: NB: The photo above is my desk, where I have spent most of my time working on my startup and academic projects for the past 6 years.

1.title: The Role of a Student CTO
1.content: As the CTO, my main responsibilities include defining our technological vision, overseeing the development process, and ensuring our product meets our business goals. This role demands a strategic mindset, technical expertise, and leadership skills. Balancing these responsibilities with my ,academic commitments adds another layer of complexity, making effective time management and prioritization crucial.

2.title: Our Project: Bring you a better experience of electric mobility

content.1: Our startup is dedicated to revolutionizing the electric mobility sector by offering a comprehensive range of software and hardware services. As an electric mobility operator, we aim to enhance the user experience for all types of clients, from individual consumers to large businesses. Our innovative solutions include user-friendly mobile applications for easy access to electric vehicles, advanced fleet management systems for businesses, and cutting-edge charging infrastructure. By integrating these services, we strive to create a seamless and efficient ecosystem for electric mobility, making it more accessible and convenient for everyone.
content.2: We believe that the future of transportation lies in sustainable and smart solutions. Our commitment to this vision drives us to continuously develop and improve our offerings, ensuring that our clients have access to the latest technologies and services in electric mobility. Whether you're an individual looking for a reliable electric vehicle or a company seeking to optimize your fleet operations, our tailored solutions are designed to meet your specific needs. By bridging the gap between technology and mobility, we are paving the way for a greener, more efficient future in transportation.

3.title: Constraints of Being a Student CTO in a Startup with Friends

content.1: - Time Management: Balancing academic responsibilities with the demands of a startup is the the biggest challenge. Effective time management is essential to ensure that both my studies and the startup receive the attention they need.
content.2: - Inexperience: As students, our inexperience can be a significant constraint. We are constantly learning on the job, which can lead to mistakes and steep learning curves. However, these experiences are invaluable for our growth and development.
content.3: - Resource Constraints: Limited resources, including time, money, and expertise, can pose challenges for a student startup. Finding creative solutions and leveraging our network are essential to overcome these constraints.
content.4: - Team Dynamics: Working with friends can be both a strength and a challenge. Navigating personal relationships and professional responsibilities requires open communication, trust, and mutual respect. To be fair, we have been doing a great job so far (since 2022).
content.5: - Academic Commitments: Balancing the demands of a startup with academic commitments can be overwhelming. Prioritizing tasks, setting boundaries, and seeking support are essential strategies to manage these competing responsibilities.
content.6: - Risk Management: As a student startup, we face unique risks and uncertainties. Managing these risks requires a proactive approach, clear communication, and contingency planning to mitigate potential challenges.

content.1: As a student CTO, embracing a mindset of continuous learning is essential for overcoming the challenges of inexperience. This means actively seeking out opportunities to enhance both technical and business skills through online courses, workshops, and seminars. Staying updated with the latest industry trends and best practices is crucial for maintaining a competitive edge. By dedicating time to learning, you not only improve your own capabilities but also contribute to the overall growth and success of your startup.
content.2: Seeking mentorship is another vital strategy for navigating the complexities of being a student CTO. Experienced mentors can provide invaluable insights and advice, helping you to make informed decisions and avoid common pitfalls. Their guidance can be particularly beneficial when dealing with unfamiliar situations or making strategic choices. Building a network of mentors and advisors who believe in your vision can significantly bolster your confidence and capabilities, providing a strong foundation for your startup's growth.
content.3: Fostering a collaborative approach within your team is also key to overcoming inexperience. Encouraging open communication and leveraging the diverse skills and perspectives of your team members can drive innovation and effective problem-solving. Emphasizing teamwork and collective decision-making helps to distribute the workload and ensures that various aspects of the project are addressed by those with the most relevant expertise. Additionally, being adaptable and open to change is crucial in the dynamic startup environment. Flexibility allows you to pivot when necessary and respond to market demands, ensuring the longevity and success of your venture.

content.1:
Being a student CTO in a startup launched with friends is a unique and rewarding journey. While inexperience and academic pressures pose significant challenges, the opportunity to learn and grow in such an environment is unparalleled. By embracing continuous learning, seeking mentorship, and maintaining a collaborative and adaptable approach, we can turn these challenges into stepping stones for success. 
As we continue to develop our innovative platform, I am confident that our passion, combined with our willingness to learn and adapt, will help us overcome obstacles and achieve our goals. The journey of a student entrepreneur was just part of the beginning, and the experiences gained along the way will be invaluable for our future endeavors. Now that we are in 2024, we are more determined than ever to make a positive impact in the electric mobility sector and contribute to a sustainable and smarter future in transportation. Also, now I am not a baby CTO anymore, but a real one.
content.2: Thanks for reading. If you have any questions or suggestions, feel free to contact me via
content.3: Check this video (in French), where me and the other co-founders talk about our startup and being a student beside.

intro.1: In this article, I will present the design and implementation of a Twitter bot named 'Football Alert Bot'.
intro.2: This bot was developed to tweet live scores of matches from the five major European leagues (Premier League, La Liga, Serie A, Bundesliga, Ligue 1), as well as the Champions League and the Europa League.
intro.3: The bot was built using Python and the Tweepy library for TwitteAdditionally, it retrieves and tweets replays of notable goals. This article is developer-oriented and explains the technical aspects of this project.

1.title: I. Prerequisites and Technologies Used
1.content: For this project, the following main technologies and tools were used:

content.1: This bot is a Java server application. It uses the Football API to retrieve live scores and replays of goals.
content.2: The bot then tweets this information using the Twitter API. The bot is scheduled to run periodically to check for new matches and goals.
content.3: The best feature is the goal replay for some of the goal notifications. For this part, I used JSOUP, which was quite challenging but yielded excellent results (gaining 200 followers in one month, if I am not mistaken).

3.title: III. What was the point of this project?

content.1: At the time, I was in my third year of university, and I had developed a strong interest in backend development. This interest was so profound that I felt the need to undertake a project to deepen my understanding of this aspect of programming. Unlike many who prefer learning through documentation and books, I have always been someone who learns best through hands-on practice. This practical approach allows me to understand tools and technologies in depth.
content.2: Being passionate about football and fascinated by the dynamics of social media, I wanted to merge these interests into a single project. My goal was to create something that would provide real value to people. I envisioned a tool that could deliver instant notifications and replays of football goals, catering to fans' desire for timely updates and highlights. This project was not only a way to enhance my technical skills but also an opportunity to engage with the football community and explore the potential of social media platforms in disseminating real-time sports information. By doing so, I aimed to create a practical and enjoyable application that would resonate with football enthusiasts and keep them informed and entertained.

content.1: You might be wondering where this account is now. Well, firstly, it was suspended by Twitter due to DMCA (Digital Millennium Copyright Act) issues related to the replays sourced from TV channels. Secondly, I was unable to maintain it because of my studies and internship commitments.
content.2: I am planning to create a new version of this bot with a better design and more features. I have gained a lot more experience over the last three years, and I am confident that I can develop an improved version of this bot, especially using the JavaScript environment. The challenge in this new version will be to make it simpler and to manage replays and notifications more effectively. We'll see how it goes in the near future.
content.3: I hope you enjoyed this article and that it has given you some insight into the development of a Twitter bot. If you have any questions or suggestions, feel free to contact me via
content.4: Thank you for reading! I am sharing the repository with you, so if you want to check the code and the design of the bot, feel free to do so!

approchIOT.title: How to Approach IoT in 2024
approchIOT.intro: The Internet of Things (IoT) holds immense potential for transforming industries by enabling enhanced connectivity, data collection, and automation. However, successfully launching an IoT project requires careful planning and execution. Here’s a streamlined guide to help you navigate your IoT project, including a real-world example of the PlugSync module.

content.1: The first step in any IoT project is to clearly define your objectives and the scope of your project. Identify the specific problems you aim to solve and the benefits you expect to gain.
content.2: Key Questions:
content.3: - What are the main goals of your IoT project?
content.4: - What challenges are you trying to address?
content.5: - What outcomes do you expect to achieve?

content.1: Conduct a comprehensive feasibility analysis to ensure your project is viable. This includes market research to understand the demand, competitive landscape, and technical requirements.
content.2: Steps:
content.3: - Identify target market and user needs.

content.1: Develop a prototype of your IoT solution to test its functionality and user experience. This allows you to identify potential issues early on and make necessary adjustments.
content.2: Best Practices:
content.3: - Use rapid prototyping tools to create a working model.
content.4: - Conduct user testing to gather feedback and iterate on the design.
content.5: - Ensure compatibility with existing systems and devices.

content.1: Once your IoT solution is ready, deploy it in a controlled environment to monitor its performance and gather data. Use analytics tools to track key metrics and identify areas for improvement.
content.2: Key Considerations:
content.3: - Establish a monitoring system to track performance and detect anomalies.
content.4: - Collect and analyze data to gain insights and optimize the system.
content.5: - Implement regular updates and improvements based on user feedback and data analysis.
content.6: - Establish a secure tunnel to connect to your devices in case of issues or updates

5.title: V. Real-World Example: Plug Sync by RMA

content.1: To illustrate these steps, let’s consider a real-world project that I worked on: The Plug Sync. In brief, Plug Sync is a module that enables charging stations to be online and visible to most customers in Europe. We developed this module to help manufacturers of charging stations increase their visibility and gain a better understanding of their customers.
content.2: Basically, we executed this project in partnership with the French manufacturer of charging stations,
content.3: We began by defining the objectives and scope of the project, which included enhancing the visibility of charging stations and providing valuable insights to electric vehicle customers. We conducted a feasibility analysis to understand the market demand and technical requirements, and then developed a prototype to test the functionality and user experience.
content.4: The project demanded significant architecture and design work to ensure its success. We needed to guarantee that the module was secure, that the data was encrypted, and that the system was easy to monitor.
content.5: It was a challenging project, but the results were rewarding. The Plug Sync module is now deployed in several charging stations across France, providing valuable data and insights to electric vehicle users (as seen in the picture in this article). We continue to monitor and iterate on the system to ensure optimal performance and user experience. The Plug Sync project exemplifies the importance of careful planning, prototyping, and monitoring in IoT projects.

content.1: Successfully launching an IoT project requires a strategic approach that encompasses defining objectives, conducting feasibility analysis, prototyping, and monitoring. By following these steps and best practices, you can navigate your IoT project effectively and achieve your desired outcomes.
content.2: Key Takeaways:
content.3: - Define clear objectives and scope for your IoT project.
content.4: - Conduct a feasibility analysis to ensure project viability
content.5: - Develop a prototype to test functionality and user experience.
content.6: - Deploy, monitor, and iterate on the system to optimize performance.
content.7: - Learn from real-world examples to gain insights and inspiration.
content.8: Thanks for reading. If you have any questions or suggestions, feel free to contact me via

zakichanTechnologies.title: The Journey of Zakichan Technologies
zakichanTechnologies.intro: Transitioning from the role of Chief Technology Officer (CTO) in a startup with friends to launching my own business has been an exhilarating journey. Being a CTO gave me a deep appreciation for entrepreneurship and the incredible potential it holds. The collaborative environment was fantastic, but I often found myself wondering what it would be like to venture out on my own. This curiosity and desire for a new challenge led to the birth of my own company, Zakichan Technologies, while I continue to serve as a CTO in my existing startup.

1.title: I. The Birth of Zakichan Technologies
1.content: Zakichan Technologies is a newly launched company dedicated to providing top-notch web technology services and strategic consulting on technical aspects. My goal is to help businesses navigate the complexities of web technologies, ensuring they can leverage the best tools and strategies to achieve their objectives. Our services are designed to cater to a wide range of clients, from small startups needing their first web presence to established companies looking to optimize their digital strategies.

2.title: II. Strategic Consulting and Web Services

content.1: At Zakichan Technologies, we offer a variety of services tailored to meet the unique needs of each client. Our web technology services include website development, e-commerce solutions, and custom web applications. We use the latest technologies and frameworks to ensure our clients have fast, secure, and scalable solutions.
content.2: In addition to web services, we provide strategic consulting to help businesses align their technology goals with their overall business strategy. This includes advising on technology stack choices, system integrations, and digital transformation strategies. Our consulting services aim to empower businesses to make informed decisions that drive growth and efficiency.

3.title: III. A Passion for Content Creation

content.1: Beyond consulting and services, Zakichan Technologies opens the door to another long-held passion of mine: content creation. Since childhood, I have been fascinated by the idea of making videos and sharing experiences that matter to me. With Zakichan Technologies, I now have the platform to create content focused on computing and the development of innovative, fun tools. This content will not only help me refine my skills but also build my personal brand, showcasing my expertise in a dynamic and engaging way.
content.2: Content creation is an integral part of Zakichan Technologies' mission. I aim to share my knowledge and inspire others in the field of technology. Topics will range from coding best practices and emerging tech trends to hands-on projects that demonstrate the practical applications of our services. This content will serve as a valuable resource for both clients and the broader tech community, fostering a deeper understanding and appreciation of web technologies.

content.1: Balancing my role as a CTO in my existing startup with the demands of launching Zakichan Technologies is undoubtedly challenging, but it's also incredibly rewarding. The experience I gain from each role complements the other. My work as a CTO keeps me grounded in the latest technological advancements and management strategies, which directly informs the services and insights I provide through Zakichan Technologies. Conversely, the entrepreneurial skills and client interactions from my new venture enhance my effectiveness as a CTO.
content.2: Time management and prioritization are crucial in juggling these dual roles. By maintaining a clear schedule and setting realistic goals, I ensure that both my responsibilities as a CTO and the growth of Zakichan Technologies receive the attention they deserve. This balancing act is not without its difficulties, but the fulfillment I derive from pursuing both paths makes it worthwhile.

content.1: The journey from CTO to solo entrepreneur is just beginning, but the potential is immense. Zakichan Technologies represents the culmination of my technical skills, strategic thinking, and creative passions. As I embark on this new venture, I am excited about the opportunities to help other companies succeed and to share my knowledge through engaging content. This business is more than just a company; it is a platform for continuous learning, innovation, and personal growth.
content.2: Launching Zakichan Technologies has shown me that the leap from collaborative entrepreneurship to solo ventures is not only possible but also immensely fulfilling. The journey is filled with challenges, but the rewards of independence, creativity, and direct impact make it all worthwhile. As I look to the future, I am eager to expand my services, reach new audiences with my content, and continue pushing the boundaries of what Zakichan Technologies can achieve.
content.3: In the coming months, I plan to expand our service offerings, delve deeper into emerging technologies, and build a strong community around Zakichan Technologies. This will include hosting webinars, launching a YouTube channel, and creating an online forum where tech enthusiasts can share ideas, ask questions, and collaborate on projects. My vision is to make Zakichan Technologies not just a service provider, but a hub for innovation and learning in the tech community.
content.4: The transition from CTO to solo entrepreneur, while maintaining my existing role, has been a transformative experience. With Zakichan Technologies, I am not just building a business; I am building a legacy of innovation, learning, and excellence in the field of web technologies. This dual journey is challenging, but it is also incredibly enriching, offering endless opportunities for growth and success.
content.5: Thanks for reading. Make sure you check all the blog posts, on the link below! If you have any questions or suggestions, feel free to contact me via

whenUJump.title: When You Actually Jump: Embracing the Fear of Starting a YouTube Channel
whenUJump.intro: “When it feels scary to jump in, that is exactly when you jump.” These words by Oscar Isaac resonate deeply, especially for anyone standing on the precipice of something daunting and unfamiliar. For me, that leap was starting a YouTube channel. Today, I uploaded my first ever video, I’m both terrified and exhilarated. Here’s how I embraced the fear, took that crucial first step, and found excitement in the journey.

1.title: I. The Paralyzing Fear
1.content: Starting a YouTube channel was something I had contemplated for a long time. I was always fascinated by the creativity and community that successful YouTubers seemed to cultivate effortlessly. Yet, the idea of putting myself out there was terrifying. What if people didn’t like my content? What if I embarrassed myself? The fear of negative judgment and failure held me back for months, even years.

content.1: Eventually, I realized that waiting for the fear to subside was futile. Inspired by Isaac's quote, I decided that my fear was a signal — not to retreat, but to act. One evening, after days of second-guessing myself, I recorded my first video. The process was nerve-wracking: I stumbled over words, worried about my appearance, and constantly adjusted the lighting and sound. Each step felt like an uphill battle against my insecurities. Finally, the video was ready. With trembling hands, I hit the 'publish' button. It felt like stepping off a cliff, not knowing if I would soar or crash. My heart raced as I watched the upload bar slowly fill, and the moment it completed, a mix of dread and exhilaration washed over me. I had done it.
content.2: As the video went live, the reality of my leap set in. I sat refreshing the page repeatedly, anxiously awaiting the first views and comments. The anticipation was almost unbearable. What would people think? Would they even watch it? Each passing minute felt like an eternity. The thrill of seeing the first few views and a couple of encouraging comments was indescribable. While the fear of judgment lingered, it was accompanied by a newfound sense of achievement. I had conquered the initial hurdle, and in that moment, the exhilaration of having finally made my move overshadowed my fears.

3.title: III. Enduring the Cringe
3.content: Watching my first video, I couldn’t help but cringe at certain moments. The sound of my own voice, the awkward pauses, and the less-than-perfect lighting all stood out glaringly. It was as if the imperfections were magnified tenfold in my eyes. The video wasn’t flawless, but it was mine. Every view, every like, and every comment will feel like a mix of validation and potential critique. The initial feedback was a rollercoaster of emotions. The self-doubt is still there, gnawing at the edges of my excitement, but publishing this video was a significant victory over my fear.

4.title: IV. Finding Joy
4.content: Despite the initial fear and inevitable cringe, the excitement of launching my channel has been immensely rewarding. The process of creating, sharing, and starting to engage with viewers is beginning to be a source of joy. The supportive comments and the budding community around my channel are beginning to form, and they are incredibly encouraging. I’m looking forward to each new video, to growing my channel, and to the joy of continuous creation.

content.1: Oscar Isaac’s words ring truer than ever. The fear was a signal that I was about to embark on something significant. Had I waited for the fear to disappear, I might still be on the sidelines, watching others live their dreams. Instead, I took the leap, and even with just one video, I’m already finding excitement in this new journey.
content.2: So, if you’re standing on the edge, scared to jump, take it from someone who’s been there: that’s exactly when you need to jump. The fear won’t go away on its own, but it can be a powerful motivator. Embrace it, endure the initial discomfort, and keep pushing forward. You might find, as I have, that what awaits on the other side of fear is something wonderful and fulfilling.
content.3: Thanks for reading. I am letting you with my first video, on the link below! If you have any questions or suggestions, feel free to contact me via

prioritizeTasks.title: How Does a 23-Year-Old Entrepreneur Prioritize Their Tasks?
prioritizeTasks.intro: At 23, juggling the demands of my two businesses, personal projects, and social commitments can be overwhelming. Effective time management and task prioritization are essential to staying focused, productive, and balanced. Here's a guide to help young entrepreneurs prioritize their tasks and achieve their goals.

content.1: The first step to effectively prioritizing your tasks is to plan and set clear goals. Identify your short-term and long-term objectives, and break them down into specific and measurable tasks. This helps you stay focused on what's important and avoid getting overwhelmed by the details.
content.2: The planning tool you choose should remain simple and effective. Personally, I use
content.4: to organize my tasks and projects. This allows me to keep an overview of my goals and track my progress transparently.
content.5: Assign timeframes to your goals, and set up personal SPRINTS (Daily, Weekly, Quarterly) to help you stay focused and track your progress. In my case, I set weekly goals.

2.title: II. Evaluate Urgency and Importance in Your Goals

content.1: Once you've set your goals, evaluate the urgency and importance of each task. Use the Eisenhower Matrix to classify your tasks based on priority. Urgent and important tasks should be handled first, while non-urgent and non-important tasks can be postponed or delegated.
content.2: What is the Eisenhower Matrix? It’s a time management tool that helps prioritize tasks based on their urgency and importance. Tasks are classified into four categories: Urgent and Important, Important but not Urgent, Urgent but not Important, and neither Urgent nor Important.
content.3: For example, when launching the development of a mobile application, planning, development, and testing of core features should be prioritized, while marketing and other minor features can be dealt with later.

content.1: While prioritizing tasks is crucial for entrepreneurial success, it’s equally important to practice self-care and maintain a healthy balance. Take time to rest, exercise, and relax to recharge and avoid burnout. Set clear boundaries between work and personal life to maintain emotional and physical well-being.
content.2: In my case, I take time each morning for physical exercise. This helps me start the day with positive energy and stay focused throughout the day.
content.3: One additional thing I’d like to implement is Andrew Huberman’s morning routine, which includes:
content.4: - Waking up at the same time every day.
content.6: - Walking outside for 10 minutes to get sunlight exposure.
content.7: The most important thing is to stay consistent with your routine. You will feel more energetic and focused throughout the day, which will help you prioritize your tasks more effectively.

content.1: Task prioritization is a key element of time management for young entrepreneurs. By planning, setting clear goals, evaluating urgency and importance, and practicing self-care, you can stay focused, productive, and balanced. Find the approach that works best for you and adapt it to your needs and goals.
content.2: Ultimately, task prioritization is a continuous process that requires practice and adjustment. By staying flexible, learning from your experiences, and keeping your goals in sight, you can achieve your objectives and realize your full potential as an entrepreneur.
content.3: Thank you for reading. If you have any questions or suggestions, feel free to contact me via
